prompts: Create a cute electric-type Pokemon that can generate powerful thunderbolts.
Imagine a small, bipedal creature with fluffy ears and a lightning tail.
Show me a friendly Pokemon that loves to play in grassy fields and parks.
Design a Pokemon with a bright, cheerful appearance and a playful personality.

Make me a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and loves to interact with people.

distinctive_features: Round cheeks that spark with electricity
